channel.title: CVE Feed for Hybrid Software -- Cloudflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hybrid Software -- Cloudflow

item.title: CVE-2022-41216|2024-08-03T12:35:49.743Z -- hybrid%20software -- cloudflow
item.description: Local File Inclusion vulnerability within Cloudflow allows attackers to retrieve confidential information from the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-41217|2024-08-03T12:35:49.606Z -- hybrid%20software -- cloudflow
item.description: Cloudflow contains a unauthenticated file upload vulnerability, which makes it possible for an attacker to upload malicious files to the CLOUDFLOW PROOFSCOPE built-in storage.
